statements: SELECT * FROM biodegradable_waste_carbon_footprint;
SELECT method_name, carbon_emission FROM biodegradable_waste_carbon_footprint WHERE waste_type = 'organic';
SELECT method_name, waste_type, carbon_emission FROM biodegradable_waste_carbon_footprint ORDER BY carbon_emission DESC;
SELECT method_id, method_name FROM biodegradable_waste_carbon_footprint WHERE carbon_emission < 5.0;
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_waste_carbon_footprint WHERE method_name LIKE '%composting%';
SELECT method_name, carbon_emission FROM biodegradable_waste_carbon_footprint WHERE carbon_emission > 0 ORDER BY carbon_emission DESC
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_waste_carbon_footprint WHERE waste_type IN ('Food Waste', 'Paper Waste')
SELECT method_id, method_name, carbon_emission FROM biodegradable_waste_carbon_footprint ORDER BY method_name ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_methods FROM biodegradable_waste_carbon_footprint
SELECT waste_type, AVG(carbon_emission) AS avg_emission FROM biodegradable_waste_carbon_footprint GROUP BY waste_type HAVING AVG(carbon_emission) > 10
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_waste_disposal_methods ORDER BY method_name ASC
SELECT method_name, carbon_footprint FROM biodegradable_waste_disposal_methods WHERE carbon_footprint < 0.5
SELECT method_name, carbon_footprint FROM biodegradable_waste_disposal_methods WHERE carbon_footprint > 0.8 ORDER BY carbon_footprint DESC
SELECT method_name, carbon_footprint FROM biodegradable_waste_disposal_methods WHERE method_name LIKE 'C%'
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_locations ORDER BY capacity DESC
SELECT method_name, carbon_footprint FROM biodegradable_waste_disposal_methods;
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_waste_disposal_methods WHERE carbon_footprint < 5.0;
SELECT method_name, carbon_footprint FROM biodegradable_waste_disposal_methods ORDER BY carbon_footprint DESC;
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_waste_disposal_methods WHERE carbon_footprint BETWEEN 2.0 AND 5.0;
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_waste_disposal_methods WHERE method_name LIKE 'Compost%' ORDER BY carbon_footprint ASC;
SELECT * FROM Waste_Disposal_Methods;
SELECT method_name, description FROM Waste_Disposal_Methods WHERE carbon_emission > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM Waste_Records ORDER BY date_recorded DESC;
SELECT method_name, carbon_emission FROM Waste_Disposal_Methods WHERE method_id = 3;
SELECT report_id, carbon_emission, report_date FROM Carbon_Footprint_Report WHERE carbon_emission < 0.2;
SELECT method_name, carbon_emission FROM Waste_Disposal_Methods;
SELECT method_name, description FROM Waste_Disposal_Methods WHERE carbon_emission > 0.5 ORDER BY method_name DESC;
SELECT method_name, description, carbon_emission FROM Waste_Disposal_Methods WHERE method_name LIKE '%collection%' AND carbon_emission BETWEEN 0.1 AND 0.5;
SELECT * FROM Waste_Records WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic' ORDER BY weight_kg DESC;

SELECT WR.record_id, WR.waste_type, CF.carbon_emission FROM Waste_Records WR JOIN Carbon_Footprint_Report CF ON WR.record_id = CF.record_id WHERE WR.weight_kg > 100 AND CF.carbon_emission > 2.5 ORDER BY WR.date_recorded ASC;
SELECT * FROM WasteTypes;
SELECT waste_name, carbon_intensity FROM WasteTypes WHERE carbon_intensity > 0.05;
SELECT option_name, method_name, effectiveness_rating FROM WasteDisposalOptions JOIN WasteDisposalMethods ON WasteDisposalOptions.method_id = WasteDisposalMethods.method_id;
SELECT waste_name, carbon_emission, date_recorded FROM WasteTypes JOIN CarbonFootprintData ON WasteTypes.waste_id = CarbonFootprintData.waste_id;
SELECT * FROM WasteDisposalMethods WHERE method_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM WasteTypes ORDER BY waste_name DESC;
SELECT waste_name, waste_description FROM WasteTypes WHERE carbon_intensity > 0.5;

SELECT wt.waste_name, wdo.option_name, wdo.option_description FROM WasteTypes wt JOIN CarbonFootprintData cfd ON wt.waste_id = cfd.waste_id JOIN WasteDisposalOptions wdo ON cfd.option_id = wdo.option_id WHERE cfd.carbon_emission < 10.0;

SELECT wt.waste_name, cfd.carbon_emission, cfd.date_recorded FROM WasteTypes wt JOIN CarbonFootprintData cfd ON wt.waste_id = cfd.waste_id WHERE cfd.date_recorded BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';

SELECT wdm.method_name, AVG(wdo.effectiveness_rating) AS avg_rating FROM WasteDisposalMethods wdm JOIN WasteDisposalOptions wdo ON wdm.method_id = wdo.method_id GROUP BY wdm.method_name ORDER BY avg_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_waste_disposal_methods;
SELECT method_name, carbon_emission FROM biodegradable_waste_disposal_methods WHERE efficiency_rating > 3;
SELECT site_name, location FROM waste_disposal_sites WHERE site_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT method_name, carbon_emission, efficiency_rating FROM biodegradable_waste_disposal_methods ORDER BY efficiency_rating DESC;
SELECT material_name, biodegradable FROM waste_materials WHERE biodegradable = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM waste_materials WHERE biodegradable = TRUE ORDER BY material_name ASC
SELECT method_name, carbon_emission FROM biodegradable_waste_disposal_methods WHERE carbon_emission > 5.0 ORDER BY carbon_emission DESC
SELECT site_name, location FROM waste_disposal_sites WHERE location LIKE '%City%'
SELECT method_name, efficiency_rating FROM biodegradable_waste_disposal_methods WHERE efficiency_rating BETWEEN 3 AND 5 ORDER BY efficiency_rating

SELECT wmd.method_name, wm.material_name FROM biodegradable_waste_disposal_methods wmd JOIN method_material_mapping mm ON wmd.method_id = mm.method_id JOIN waste_materials wm ON mm.material_id = wm.material_id ORDER BY wmd.method_name ASC
